ValidationRule.description: Need to restrict certain Roles from using the Warranty Approved? picklist values of Approved or Denied.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ( (ISPICKVAL(Warranty_Approved__c,"Approved")) || (ISPICKVAL(Warranty_Approved__c,"Denied")) ), (ISCHANGED(Warranty_Approved__c)), ($UserRole.Name <> "Operating Risk Manager"), (NOT(BEGINS($UserRole.Name,"Operating Risk Supervisor"))), ($UserRole.Name <> "System Administrator") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot change the value in the Warranty Approved? field to Approved or Denied.
